metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3977 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the XCF image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.3. A specially crafted XCF image can cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability. USN-4238-1 addressed serveral vulnerabilities in SDL_image. This update provides the corresponding fixes for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sdl-image1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
